programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: The stories we're covering today, that will affect our lives tomorrow. Deep Space Technologies, the SCOUT mission, Cosmic Shielding and more... Duration: 3600

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: Turns out, Sky Sharks are entirely possible and the best light saber fights happen in video games! Duration: 3600

programme.title: Micah Walter-Range & New Space Economy
programme.desc: Space Channel has an in-depth interview with Micah Walter Range, President of Caelus Partnerrs. Topics covered, progression of the commercial space industry, militarization of space and potential for conflict. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: The stories we're covering today, that will affect our lives tomorrow. Deep Space Technologies, the SCOUT mission, Cosmic Shielding and more... Duration: 3600

programme.title: Cinespace: for all Humanity
programme.desc: Space Channel Presents Cinespace, an partnership between The Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA. These are award winning movies that will definitely inspire. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Cinespace Movie Special
programme.desc: We have more inspirational and thought provoking films from around the world coming up with the best of Cinespace! In 2015, Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA began bridging the gap of space and art by way of film. They created CineSpace to promote the creative exploration of the vast NASA archive, inviting filmmakers from around the world to showcase that footage in their masterpieces. It’s exciting watching the space industry evolve in real time, and we get to see the creative perspective of this aerospace revolution Duration: 7200

programme.title: Astral Travel
programme.desc: Astral Travel is an intentional out-of-body experience that assumes the existence of a soul called an "astral body" that is separate from the physical body and capable of traveling outside it throughout the universe. Duration: 5400

programme.title: I Married a Monster from Outer Space
programme.desc: One of their first victims is a young man, whose new wife soon realizes something is wrong with him. Duration: 5400

programme.desc: Take a journey into the beyond with Walter Lloyd and the After Dark crew Duration: 14400
